channel.title: Need help with this error BAD!
channel.description: up until recently, my server was fine, i could compile, run every1 could get on, but now whenever i add something and compile it, i cant get on, and neither can any1 else, it shows up on runserver, but then it just wont log on...its not just one server, i keep downloading different sources to see if they will work, and i can log in once, but after i add something and compile it, whether its changing a name or adding a command, and i compile, i cant log in and neither can any1 else, can any help me?!

item.title: Need help with this error BAD!
item.dc:creator: @lilg101 lilg101
item.description:
@lilg101 wrote:

i cant even get my compiler to work =’( so gratz on urs lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this error BAD!

item.description:
@robfer2 wrote:

i got the same problem its my norton .
first i could log into my own server then i compiled it and poof!
norton keeps spamming and saying its a virus.
but i know moparscape is not a virus

item.title: Need help with this error BAD!
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

no he said he could log in the first time… i think it’s something to do with saving the players files… tell me when you log in first time and log out does it say in the server window “could not save for USERNAME” or “Client USERNAME saved sucessfully” (or similar things)

Read full topic

item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

try a different compiler, preferably The perfect compiler v1.9 do a search for thread. And if not you must ask yourself why it’s only happened recently have you change anything to your comp? download new java? anything like that?
